plays.text: Penalty to Shayne Corson 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Chris Neil

Penalty to Wade Redden 2 minutes for High Sticking Gary Roberts
Goal scored by Magnus Arvedson assisted by Mike Fisher and Martin Havlat

Goal scored by Magnus Arvedson assisted by Martin Havlat
Goal scored by Daniel Alfredsson assisted by Benoit Brunet
Goal scored by Gary Roberts assisted by Jonas Hoglund and Bryan McCabe
Goal scored by Travis Green assisted by Shayne Corson and Alexander Mogilny
